title: What does regime change mean? Trump comments on Iran leadership
shortDescription: The term "regime change" has emerged as a key point of focus after the U.S. struck Iran nuclear sites. Here's what it means.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Often worse than views on immigration
shortDescription: Immigration has long been a flash point of President Donald Trump's rhetoric. He polls higher on the issue than his overall approval rating.

title: Trump says he's open to regime change in Iran
shortDescription: A day after the U.S. military bombed three Iranian nuclear sites, President Trump said he might desire a broader 'regime change' in Iran.

title: Trump to MAGA: Drop Massie 'like the plague' for Iran strike criticism
shortDescription: Massie said his "side of the MAGA base" is made up of "non-interventionists" who are "tired from all these wars."

title: Protests erupt calling for U.S. to stay out of a war in Middle East
shortDescription: People protested against U.S. military involvement in Iran this weekend and plan to continue demonstrations later this week.

title: Trump's MAGA allies warn against 'forever war' after Iran attack
shortDescription: MAGA figure Steve Bannon said Trump's comments about potential future strikes on Iran are "open ended" and worried the situation could escalate.

title: Trump says Iran's nuclear sites were 'obliterated.' Were they?
shortDescription: While that may be the case, an independent assessment of Iran's nuclear sites by the International Atomic Energy Agency has not occurred.

title: Trump vowed to keep U.S. out of wars. What changed with Iran attack?
shortDescription: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has long lobbied American presidents to help Israel bomb Iran. None have taken him up on it, until now.

title: Trump's gamble on Iran: Threat ended? Or the start of 'endless war'?
shortDescription: It's Donald Trump's war now. The decision to bomb Iran illustrates the conflict between some of the president's fundamental impulses.

title: What is the War Powers Act, and what does it mean for Trump on Iran?
shortDescription: Republican and Democratic lawmakers alike have criticized President Donald Trump's decision to bomb nuclear facilities in Iran.

title: Read: President Trump speech to the nation after US strikes on Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke to the country June 21 after the U.S. bombed three Iranian nuclear facilities.

title: Trump addresses the nation after attack on Iran
shortDescription: After a U.S. attack on three nuclear sites in Iran that President Trump called "very successful," he addressed the nation.

title: Trump addresses the nation after attack on Iran
shortDescription: After a U.S. attack on three nuclear sites in Iran that President Trump called "very successful," he addressed the nation from the Oval Office.
